results.name: Numbers n such that 50*R_n + 1 is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comment: Also numbers n such that (5*10^(n+1)-41)/9 is prime.
link: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 55...551.
